# Ghulam Mohiuddin - Senior iOS Developer

> Senior iOS Developer with 4+ years of experience crafting production-ready, high-performance mobile applications with Swift & SwiftUI.

## About
Ghulam Mohiuddin is a Senior iOS Developer based in Lahore, Pakistan, currently working at iParagons Tech. He specializes in Swift, SwiftUI, and modern iOS frameworks including SceneKit, RealityKit, SiriKit, WidgetKit, and In-App Purchases. He has extensive experience building full-stack mobile solutions with backend integrations using REST APIs, ChatGPT API, Gemini AI, FastAPI, and Supabase.

## Skills
Swift, SwiftUI, Objective-C, UIKit, Combine, CoreData, SwiftData, ARKit, RealityKit, SceneKit, SiriKit, WidgetKit, CloudKit, StoreKit, MapKit, CoreML, In-App Purchases, REST APIs, Firebase, Supabase, Git, Xcode, Instruments, MVVM, Clean Architecture, Python, FastAPI, ChatGPT API, Gemini AI

## Experience
- **Senior iOS Developer** at iParagons Tech (2021 - Present)
  - Expert in Swift, SwiftUI, Combine, SceneKit, RealityKit, SiriKit, WidgetKit
  - Built production apps with In-App Purchases, backend integrations, and AI features

## Featured Projects

### Invoza - Invoice & Estimate Maker
A professional invoicing and estimates app with beautiful UI, PDF generation, multi-currency support, and cloud sync.
Technologies: Swift, SwiftUI, CoreData, PDFKit, CloudKit, StoreKit, In-App Purchases, MVVM
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/invoza-invoice-maker/id6756181651

### Leaf - Plant Identifier
An AI-powered plant identification app using advanced machine learning to identify plants from photos.
Technologies: Swift, SwiftUI, CoreML, Vision, AVFoundation, In-App Purchases, Networking

### AI Smart Reminder
An intelligent reminder app powered by AI that helps users manage tasks and schedules smartly.
Technologies: Swift, SwiftUI, ChatGPT API, UserNotifications, CoreData, WidgetKit, MVVM
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ai-smart-reminder/id6747449550

### MultiRoom
A collaborative space management app with multiple virtual rooms for organizing content and projects.
Technologies: Swift, SwiftUI, RealityKit, SceneKit, Multipeer Connectivity, CloudKit

### Mimic.me
AI-powered content creation app that generates personalized content using advanced AI models.
Technologies: Swift, SwiftUI, Gemini, MVVM, FastAPI, Python, Supabase

### PureMetric
A comprehensive nutrition tracking app with detailed macro/micro-nutrient analysis and daily reports.
Technologies: Swift, SwiftUI, SwiftData, HealthKit, Charts, MVVM

### Sly AI - Prank Photos & Videos
An AI-powered prank content generator using Gemini for creating convincing prank photos and videos.
Technologies: Swift, SwiftUI, Gemini, MVVM, FastAPI, Python, Supabase
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/pk/app/sly-ai-prank-photos-videos/id6757885307

### DarkFinder
A reverse image search and person finder app with AI-powered analysis.
Technologies: Swift, SwiftUI, Vision, CoreML, Networking, MVVM
